scripts.problema1: npm start hillClimbing problema1 && npm start hillClimbingRestart problema1 && npm start simulatedAnnealing problema1 && npm start ag problema1
scripts.problema2: npm start hillClimbing problema2 && npm start hillClimbingRestart problema2 && npm start simulatedAnnealing problema2 && npm start ag problema2
scripts.problema3: npm start hillClimbing problema3 ./input/38cities.txt && npm start hillClimbingRestart problema3 ./input/38cities.txt && npm start simulatedAnnealing problema3 ./input/38cities.txt && npm start ag problema3 ./input/38cities.txt
